text: "Anywhere" is a song by English singer-songwriter Passenger. The song was released as a digital download on 19 August 2016 in the United Kingdom, as the second single from his seventh studio album, Young as the Morning, Old as the Sea (2016). ==Music video== A music video to accompany the release of "Anywhere" was first released onto YouTube on 19 August 2016 at a total length of three minutes and seventeen seconds.Anywhere (Official Video) on YouTube.
